title: Mobile Language Learning Design Grounded in Social Constructivism

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Interaction enhancement in smartphone-based limited tech environments for pre-/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can utilize ≥3 social interaction strategies with peers/instructors via mobile platforms
Learners complete ≥80% of language feedback exchanges using asynchronous discussion tools (comments, forums)
Learners complete two language tasks through collaboration with peers during weekly learning activities and write a reflective journal.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
